alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chemung; Chenango; Delaware; Otsego; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 3:46PM EST until March 09 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Bradford, Susquehanna and Northern Wayne counties. In New York, Tioga, Broome, Delaware, Otsego, Chenango and Chemung counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...A Winter Storm Warning for heavy snow means heavy snow is expected or occurring. Heavy snow is forecast that will make travel very dangerous. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow, heavy at times, will continue over the next couple of hours before tapering off this evening. Snowfall rates up to an inch per hour are occurring in the heaviest of bands. Heaviest additional totals are possible where any one band can settle, or where multiple rounds of heavy snow can occur.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission strongly encourage motorist to heed all travel restrictions and delay unnecessary travel. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadways, and traffic conditions.

area.areaDesc: Broome; Chemung; Chenango; Delaware; Otsego; Tioga
